card_text: Add 1 "Gem-Knight" card from your Deck to your hand, then you can apply this effect.$N‚óèFusion Summon 1 "Gem-Knight" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your hand or your side of the field.$NYou can only activate 1 "Absorb Fusion" per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except "Gem-Knight" monsters.
